content: knit cuddly critters designed by lorraine pistorio thank you for purchasing my cuddly critters pattern i hope you enjoy creating your own cuddly critter stitch explanation k = knit p = purl tw = turn work sl1 = slip 1 stitch yo= yarn over kfb = knit into the front & back of the stitch… 1 stitch increased m1 = make one pick up the bar between the stitches through the back loop… 1 stitch increased a lifted increase could be substituted for the m1 k2tog = knit 2 stitches together…1 stitch decreased p2tog = purl 2 stitches together…1 stitch decreased ssk = slip one stitch knitwise slip the next stitch knitwise insert left needle through the two slipped stitches on the right needle wrap yarn around right needle and knit the two stitches together… 1 stitch decreased yarn #3-light wt dk wt approx yardage … w&t = wrap & turn… knit side facing bring yarn forward slip next stitch to right needle bring yarn to animals 150 yds each back place the slipped stitch back on left needle turn king cole dollymix dk-taupe work … purl side facing bring yarn to back slip next red heart babyhugs light-dolphin stitch to right needle bring yarn forward place the premier everyday dk-almond slipped stitch back on left needle turn work ksw = knit shadow wrap jackets 60 yds each with the right needle lift this stitch and place it on left king cole dollymix dk-candy needle red heart babyhugs light-sprout & bluie size 3 3 25mm 32 circular knitting needles if using magic loop or double pointed needles 10mm safety eyes or embroidery thread/yarn embroidery thread/yarn for nose 3/8 button for each large-eyed blunt needle & long straight pins knit this stitch and removable stitch markers ring markers place it back on the polyester fiberfill stuffing left needle next to its shadow treat the stitch and skill level intermediate its shadow as one size sits approx 7 without ears stitch the resulting size will be determined by the type of yarn size needles and your personal gauge gauge gauge is not critical for this project work tight enough to ensure that the stuffing will not show through the stitches inquiries contact rainebodesigns@yahoo com like rainebo designs on facebook http //www facebook com/rainebo-designs-1732403310368724/ ©2022 lorraine pistorio this pattern is not to be sold or given for free to others if you use this pattern to make items for commercial use please give me credit for the pattern please feel free to sell any completed items made from my designed pattern or donate any completed items to charity do not copy reproduce sell and/or distribute this pattern in any form this design and material are copyrighted and protected by federal copyright infringement knit cuddly critters designed by lorraine pistorio thank you for purchasing my cuddly critters pattern i hope you enjoy creating your own cuddly critter psw = purl shadow wrap note the arms legs body and head of all the slip the
